author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Michigan order banning travel 'between residences' takes effect
description: An extension of Michigan's "stay home" order barring residents from buyi...
content:
An extension of Michigans stay home order barring residents from buying nonessential items or traveling between residences in the state except for essential activities went into effect Saturday morning.
Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) signed the order Friday eveni… [+1346 chars]
